description:
doc/go1: document ProcessState
Also reformat the "go fix" references to make them look better by using the non-CW space.

Fixes issue 3087.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c73c5bbb2156 ***

doc/go1: document ProcessState
Also reformat the "go fix" references to make them look better by using the non-CW space.

Fixes issue 3087.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5695057

LGTM http://codereview.appspot.com/5695057/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5695057/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode195 doc/go1.tmpl:195: Running go fix will convert expressions of the form m[k] = ignored, intentional? http://codereview.appspot.com/5695057/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode462 doc/go1.tmpl:462: Running go fix will update all imports and package renames for packages that apparently.

subject: code review 5695057: doc/go1: document ProcessState
